an7.9:1.1: “Sattannam, bhikkhave, samyojananam pahanaya samucchedaya brahmacariyam vussati.
an7.9:1.3: Anunayasamyojanassa pahanaya samucchedaya brahmacariyam vussati, patighasamyojanassa …pe…
an7.9:1.9: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, sattannam samyojananam pahanaya samucchedaya brahmacariyam vussati.
an7.9:1.10: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno anunayasamyojanam pahinam hoti ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
an7.9:1.16: avijjasamyojanam pahinam hoti ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
an7.9:1.17: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu acchecchi tanham, vivattayi samyojanam, samma manabhisamaya antamakasi dukkhassa”ti.
